subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Gerrit Cole took a shutout into the seventh inning of his major league debut and hit a two-run single in his first at-bat, leading the Pittsburgh Pirates to an 8-2 victory over San Francisco.
snippet: Gerrit Cole took a shutout into the seventh inning of his major league debut and hit a two-run single in his first at-bat, leading the Pittsburgh Pirates to an 8-2 victory over San Francisco.
